org.jugsaxony.treed.api

Interface Constants

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnimationStrategy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBaseAnimationStrategy, DukeSaxony, MyStrategy, SnakeDown, SnakeUp, TeleLotto, VerticalRainbow, WarpEngine, XmasScrew

    public interface Constants
    What you need to know about TreeD: The tree lives in a quite mathematical environment. The coordinate origin (0,0,0) is in the center of the tree at the bottom. The diameter at the bottom is 1.0, so the radius is 0.5 . The height is assumed to be 1.25 . There can always be some LED bulbs that are located a bit outside of this system.

      Assume the tree is about 1.25 as high as it's diameter.
      static double TREE_RADIUS
      Assume the tree has a diameter of one and design your algorithm accordingly.
